hymn.title: In the advent light, O Savior

lyrics.stanza: In the advent light, O Savior, I am living day by day; Waiting, working, watching ever, Knowing Thou art on Thy way.
Separated unto Jesus, Loosed from all the world beside; Blinded by the advent glory, Hour by hour would I abide.
So from glory unto glory, Gladdened by the advent ray; All the path is growing brighter, Shining unto perfect day.
In the advent light rejoicing; Songs of praise along the road Seem to make the journey shorter, Mounting upward to our God.
He is coming! He is coming! Pass the heavenly watchword on: Go ye forth to meet the Bridegroom, Hail! to God's anointed Son.
